Naming/VariableName.description:
Description

Use the configured style when naming variables.
Naming/VariableName.option:
This rule supports the following parameters in your configuration:

EnforcedStyle: snake_case (type: str)
SupportedStyles: ['snake_case', 'camelCase'] (type: list)
AllowedIdentifiers: [] (type: list)
AllowedPatterns: [] (type: list)
ForbiddenIdentifiers: [] (type: list)
ForbiddenPatterns: [] (type: list)
